name: OUT NOW: Juvie "It Aint' Love/ Juvie Fight Song"
description:
RELEASE DATE: December 14

Juvie are back with their second sexy platter on Surfin' Ki Rec! This time they have cut classes and a few shook up ol' ladies to bring you "It Ain't Love", a real guitar grinding stomper perfect for your basement party and getting loose on the dance floor, thile the flipside track "Juvie Fight Song" is sure to gill as many sport stadiums as Gary Glitter's "Rock And Roll Part Two". Thereìs just no stopping these crazy kids and no stopping Rock & Roll!!! Become a juvenile delinquent and get your copy now!

Side A: It' Aint' Love

Side B: Juvie Fight Song

The 1st press ofis limited to 300 copies including 50 on coloured wax!

name: OUT NOW: Chord Rockers "Salaria" LP
description:
*RELEASE DATE: December 14

THE CHORD ROCKERS
Boston – Rome – Thiene

Richie Parsons, Alex Vargiu, and Astrid Dante all met in Rome in 2006 at the Road To Ruins Festival. Richie’s band Unnatural Axe were invited to play thanks to Suz Motta and Pierpaolo de lulis who found them on a My Space page created by Richie’s daughter…the Chord Rockers were born. 
Astrid now fronts Miss Chain and the Broken Heels, Alex is the singer and guitarist for Dissuaders.
Pop meets Punk and in the middle was Richie’s new found desire to write music again. Richie started writing as soon as he got back to the US in the hopes of building a Rock & Roll bridge between Boston and Italy.
In the spring of 2007 Richie retuned to Rome again, this time in support of and backing Cheetah Chrome. Alex booked studio time and played guitar and Astrid sang. Basic tracks had been recorded in Boston with Frank Dehler of Unnatural Axe on Bass and Jack Clark of Jerry’s Kids and Unnatural Axe on Drums
Over the course of the next few years, as time permitted the songs were completed. The sound is a blend of Richie’s Boston Rock foundation, Alex’s aggressive guitar style and Astrid’s pure pop sensibility. All held together by Frank & Jack.

Side A:
Salaria
You're the One
Subway
No Time
 
 
Side B:
Too much Stuff
Sunny Sunday
Candy

The 1st press of the record is limited to 300 copies including 50 on coloured wax!

name: OUT NOW: Dome La Muerte & The Diggers "If You Fight / Johnny In Space" 7"
description:
Release date: December 14

Dome la Muerte (italian punk rock hero, ex CCM and Not Moving)  finally comes back to explosive Rock & Roll, backed by a completely new line up that sounds harder and better than ever!
This 7" is an anticipation of their new album "Supersadobabi" (coming out soon on Go Down Records) and it contains two brand new tracks where the Diggers mix 70's punk, R&R and glam!

Side B: Johnny In Space

The 1st run of the record is limited to 300 copies including 50 on coloured wax!

Each LP will also include a free CD version of the record (gently provided by Stefan Stardumb)! Preorder it now and get the chance to win a free testpress copy of the record! People from the US & Canada can now preorder both the black wax and the limited coloured wax edition @ THE MACHINE SHOP WEBSTORE and save money on the shipping! ***Please read: this is a presale, all the orders including this record will mailed out after the 25th of January 2014!

name: TheYum Yum "...Play Good Music" LP
description: Oh no it's THE YUM YUMS again! The world's most famous power-pop band is back with another album! Their fourth full-length is called THE YUM YUMS Play Good Music, and it's absolutely true! It's stacked with catchy hi-energy, guitar-driven power-pop songs, complete with sugary multi-layered harmonies and lyrics that seems to be stolen from some 12 year-old girl's diary. Like Joss Hutton once wrote in Bucketfull Of Brains Magazine, 'Let's consider the three minute pop-song for a second or two: so simple in it's construction, so inscrutable in it's perfection, so many who have tried and failed! For me the YUM YUMS have been THE band to watch over the past few years, their perfect (yep, it's true) take on the "power-pop" thang is a source of constant pleasure and amuzement'. A pretty good description that is, but what more can we say about those ambassadors of power-pop? They deliver REAL POWER-POP, with the word power written in capital letters. Putting together the essential ingrediences of the music of the RAMONES, the PLIMSOULS and the OHIO EXPRESS, the 6t's and the 7t's, bubblegum and punk, pop and rock'n'roll, just to create their very own YUMMY sound. So, what we're talking about is extremely catchy pop-music with a fat, rockin' guitar sound, well executed vocal-lines, ridin'-on-the-waves drums and a crunchy punk feel to it. It simply makes you feel good! Their previous album "Whatever Rhymes With Baby" took THE YUM YUMS touring through Spain, Italy, Germany, Japan and USA. This new album may even take them to Sweden!

description:
The Yum YUms turn into the Twistaroos and start to play catchy Rock & Roll they way you would expect them to do!

Side A

3. Everybody's gonna get some
4. (Let's go) Where The Action Is

7. I like It Like That

Side B

2. You Better Run
3. Dog Fight
4. Animal Instinct
5. I'm Ready
6. Baby Baby Baby
7. I May Never Get To Heaven

name: THE MCRACKINS "Comicbooks & bubblegum" LP
description:
Hatching onto the international punk scene in January 1995 with their brilliant debut album "What came first", those two crazy canadian eggheads and chicken known as THE MCRACKINS have amazed and astounded wide-eyed onlookers with their human feats and accomplishments. Thus,establishing themselves as one of the best and most prolific power-pop/ pop-punk bands of the 90s. Having released over 200 songs on over 30 different labels and extensively touring Europe,the USA and Canada, THE MCRACKINS will not and cannot be stopped in the quest for world domination.
 
Starting 1999 off with a bang,THE MCRACKINS are teaming up once again with Germany's SCREAMING APPLE RECORDS for their first studio album release in nearly two years,entitled "Comicbooks & bubblegum". The album features 15 new slabs of grade-A bubblepunk served up the way only THE MCRACKINS can. It's a remarkable collection of irresistible toons with the trademark melodies, great lyrics and hooks galore that have made the band a favorite among power-pop/punk fans the world over.This record will eggcite MCRACKINS fans and win over the non-believers once and for all.

description:

The 1st press is limited to 150 copies and we only have 10 copies available!

name: Radio Days "C'est La Vie" LP
description:
Radio Days are Italy’s answer to the pure Powerpop perfection, an ideal mix between the beatlesque melodies of the sixties and the seventies punk energy. "C'est La Vie" is their latest full lenght containing ten new gems that respectfully show the band's love of the classical powerpop in the way of Paul Collins Beat, Rubinoos and The Knack intended it, rearranged in a fresh and personal style. This latest long playing is the record wich moves Radio Days towards the full musical maturity, consecrating them as one of the best independent italian bands!

1st run of the LP is limitd to 300 copies!

15 songs, under 25 minutes. A new line up. But the same old band. Everything is turned up a notch, and not just the speed. Most definitely what the fans have been waiting for after dealing with the Teenage Head CD and the split CD with the Riptides.

description:
February 14 is getting closer and Kepi's Valentines are coming back too! This is the first time we are working on something like this and we are very excited also cause this year our favourite rock & roll shark is backed up by Kevin Preston of PRIMA DONNA and FOXBORO HOT TUBS!!!

This is what you'll get:

One CD feauturing two classic punk rock love songs re-interpretated by Kepi and Kevin Preston, released here for the very first time!

One clean envelope (all the stuff will be mailed inside another one so you don't need anithing else)!

Limited to 300 copies! Only a very few available trough our webstore so hurry up!!!

***Please keep in mind that we are mailing these cards from Italy, we are sure that all the customers from Europe will get their orders in time for the 14th of February but we can't assure the same for customers from other parts fo the planet!!!

The Lexicon Devils are a nervous trio hailing from Rome. They play fast and explosive old school hardcore punk contaminated with a touch of raw garage-rock n roll. Their main influences are Regulations, La Piovra, Zero Boys, Brown Sugar, Circle Jerks, Agent Orange, Formaldehyde Junkies, Brutal Knights, Indigesti, NBT and more.. This debut ep, produced and mixed by Lorenzo Moretti (Taxi & Giuda), is shocking, a real punch in your face. Turn up the volume full blast and enjoy! It’s 50% rage, 50% fun!

Tracklist:

A2 - Regicide
B1 - Intolerant Guy
B2 - Come On Over

The 1st press of the record is limited to 300 copies including 40 on white wax!

Originally released in 2007, The Last Killers (Italy) debut album "3 Bomb Over Berlin"  is a wild mix of frat rock, garage punk, bear and R'n'R. It has been described as a crazy juke-box that plays old James Brown and Tina Turner hits mixed with obscure Outsiders, Gravedigger V and Sonics' gems!

name: Hangee V / Angry Breed "Sounds of Fuzz" split 7"
description:
RELEASE DATE: SEPTEMBER 24!!!

Hagee V (Sardinia) VS Angry Breed (Sweden), garage surf rock & roll at its full potential! Two new songs for each band!!!

The Hangee V:
Here comes the newest issue of the infamous Hangee V hailing from the zombie island of Sardinia, with their typical sound made of snotty garage punk fuzz buzz and organ mixed with reverb drenched surf instrumentals. Their two songs on this release are “In the Wood” and the instro Green Slippers and will take you to the weirdest tales from your winklepicker boot.

H-V' side:

In The Wood / Green Slippers

The Angry Breed:
The Surfites' new side project The Angry Breed is all about fuzz guitar. Not into "real" biker culture but highly influenced by the exploitation movies and soundtracks of the mid 60's. Their two songs on this release ("Sickle Girl" and "Go-Go Scene") are both originals and deliver fuzz a plenty for any fuzz freak to dig on!

A-B' side:

Sikle Girl / Go-Go Scene

Coverart by Shawn Dickinson!!!

1st run pf the 7" limited to 300 copies including 45 on clear red wax and 5 on solid red (soldout)!

https://soundcloud.com/surfinkirecords/hangee-v-in-the-wood

The record includes also a cover of the classic Cheap Trick "Southern Girls"!

name: DeeCRACKS / Murderburgers live split LP!
description:
After years of being friends in music and playing shows together all over Europe, two of Europeans finest and hardest working pop punk/punk rock bands are now finally releasing a split record. Austrias DeeCRACKS and Scotlands MURDERBURGERS have recorded Live studio sessions for this 12" vinyl delicacy brought to you by SURFIN' KI RECORDS!

This release is limited to 500 pieces of yellow vinyl and includes download codes for all you digital 21st century kids out there! 

Both bands have shot videos to their live session, which can be seen in HD on YouTube. The bands present themselves as raw, honest, powerful, just as what they are. A true punk rock record with spirit, fun and edge. Truly a pearl for every punkrock record collection!

After an amazing 7" and an LP that is already considered a real masterpiece, Rome's glam rockers Giuda come back with the single "Number 10" on SKR!
Two new tracks, same killer style: Slade and minor 70s' glam rock, wild pub rock and original english punk mixed with attitude and a lot of passion for footbal... GIUDA RULE, O.K.?!

The 2nd press of the 7" is limited to 400 copies including 100 on BLACK WAX, 100 on WHITE WAX (SKR/Italian edition), 150 on CLEAR GREEN WAX (Contra Records/German edition) and 50 on CLEAR UNCOLOURED WAX (Waterslide Records/Japanese edition). New coverart and labels!

Gonzales: Like Your Love Climbs


The 1st press is limited to 300 copies, including 250 on black wax and 50 on white!

name: The Manges "The Manges 'R' Good Enough" REMASTERED LP!
description:
Originally released by the great Star Dumb Records in 2001, The Manges "R Good Enough" is now available again on Surfin'Ki! 
The entire album has been analogically remastered by Johnny Love (same guy who worked on the mixing of the Manges' latest album Bad Juju). The process gives a whole new life to the record which sounds a lot more "clean" and powerful now, revealing a lot of interesting and unexpected details that were previously hidden in the old mix!


SIDE A:
1. I'm A Monkey
2. Blame Game
3. Elvis Has Left The Building
4. I'll Take You To Hawaii
5. I Hate Rats (Feat Joe King of the Queers)
6. 80's Soldier

Side B:
7. Kids Are At The Mall
8. Miss Evil
9. Now Or Never
10. Goonies 'R' Good Enough
11. Rumble In Chinatown
12. Yeah (Late Nite Song)

The release is limited to 400 copies - 200 on black wax, 100 on clear blue wax and 100 on clear white wax (these ones are nearly soldout!!!)


MP3 DOWNLOAD CODE INCLUDED!

name: Sore Subjects "Missing Link" 7"
description:
Sore Subjects come from Chicago Illinois, and they are the perfect combination of the TRUE three chord style (do you know about bands like The Ramones, Head and the Vapids?) and the Spits obsessive sound.... TNT!!!

This is their 2nd ep, feauturing 4 brand new songs!

Side A:
Obscene Calls / Wearing You Down

Side B:
Chain Of Command / Missing Link

The 1st press is limited to 300 copies, including 50 on white wax (soldout) and 50 on another colour (Waterslide Record edition).

Every copy includes an MP3 download code and a free Sore Subjects pin!

name: Sore Subjects S/T 7"
description:
Sore Subjects 1st self produced 7". Contains 4 tracks about weird hairstyles,  pinheads, boneheads & more! 

DOWNLOAD CODE INCLUDED!

name: The Hextalls - Rock You To Sleep LP
description:
This is a new Hextalls album fresh off the presses for 2012! You'll be tapping your toes and raising your middle fingers up to the sky right along to all 13 of these handcrafted pop punk gems! Songs about cutting your testicles with an exacto knife? Check! Songs about No pants golfing? Check! Two finger power chords and drums that go SMASH SMASH?!? CHECK FUCKIN YEAH, BRO! Buy it now and tell all your friends!

SIDE A
1 - Welcome To The Record II: Electric Boogaloo
2 - My Name Is Kenny Rogers
2 - Justine
4 - I Just Want To Sleep On The Treehouse
5 - Grant Lawrence, King Of Forest
5- (I Don't Want To Play) Tiger Woods (With You)
7 - Dirty Kelly Gruber

SIDE B
1 - I Don't Wanna Go Down To The Basement Either
2 . I Bred This Beard For Slaughter
3 - Live Free And Die Hard
4 - I'm a Hulkamaniac!
5 - Pebbles, The Happiest Chihuahua
6 - Holy Fuck, I'm a Dad!
7 - You're My best Friend In The Whole Wide World


1st run limited to 400 copies, 100 on black wax, 100 on clear yellow, 100 on clear orange and 100 on clear blue (band exclusive edition available here only till the end of december 2013)!

MP3 DOWNLOAD CODE + FREE HEXTALLS PIN INCLUDED!

name: The Hextalls - Get Smashed LP
description:
For the 1st time on vinyl! Seventeen (not yet, but soon to be) pop punk classics in the vein of Panic At The Disco, Paramore, Lady Gaga, Dear Landlord, and whoever else is relevant (moves units) these days.  Just kidding!  Hextalls sound like the Ramones, but not as good!  Do they have songs about videogames? Check! Do they namedrop characters from the Pop Punk Message Board? Check! Autotuning up there with the Copyrights? Check! How can you go wrong?!


SIDE A:
I'm a recluse
My dad vs shania twain
Pacman
I met her at the ropetow
Rally
I don't wanna be a new York ranger
The final countdown 2
Mid record power ballad
My Xbox got the red ring of death

SIDE B:
I'm an alcoholic
Diaper change
We're the castle crashes
Bryan Adams
Tina turner
Kristine
Mark Wilson
I'm hiding your car keys in the garbage


1st run limited to 400 copies, 100 on black wax, 100 on clear yellow, 100 on clear orange and 100 on clear red (band exclusive available here only till the end of december 2013)!

MP3 DOWNLOAD CODE + FREE HEXTALLS PIN INCLUDED!

name: Steaknives "Against You / Victims" 7"
description:
After one EP and an LP both well reviewed by the most important punk 'zines like Maximum Rock'N'Roll, THE STEAKNIVES are back  with this new 7"! 
The new songs "Against You" and "Victims" confirm their devotion to the 1st era Black Flag' sound and to the early L.A. punk H/C scene. 
The production of Lorenzo of the great bands Giuda and Taxi and the artwork by Simone Lucciola (one of the most important italian comic strip artist), this 7" is a masterpiece for every fan of real PUNK!

The 1st press of the record is limited to 300 copies, including 40 on grey wax!

Dopo un e.p. ed un LP entrambi accolti con entusiasmo da magazines e fanzines del calibro di Maximum R'n'R gli STEAKNIVES approdano su Surfin' Ki Rec con il loro nuovo 7"!
I due pezzi AGAINST YOU e VICTIMS confermano la fedeltà dei quattro al sound dei primi Black Flag e al primo feroce punk di Los Angeles. 
Prodotto da Lorenzo dei GIUDA e con l'artwork di uno dei più importanti fumettisti italiani,Simone Lucciola,questo 7" è una chicca irrinunciabile per tutti gli amanti del vero Punk!

Tiratura limitata a 300 copie, incluse 40 copie su vinile grigio!

name: The Invalids / Tough - SPLIT 7" 2012!
description:
RELEASE DATE: February 13th!

Tracklist:

Invalids side:
1 - Franklyin Ave. Lament
2 - Into The Future

Tough side:
1 - Bullshits
2 - Johnny Is A Marshal
3 - Got A Problem

Killer artwork by Riccardo Bucchioni, Screeching Weasel's coverart/poster artist!

Available on black (220), clear pink (40)  or red wax (40)!

MP3 DOWNLOAD CODE INCLUDED!

name: Kung Fu Monkey "The Son Of The Incredibly Strange Case Of The Mysterious Mystrery
description:
Mutant Pop heroes The Kung Fu Monkeys return with their long-awaited 13th extended player released by Surfin'Ki Records from Italy and Waterslide Records from Japan! 
The two songs on this 7" were built upon the adventures started in "Heloise's Epiphany," which appeared as a bonus track on the "Christmas for Breakfast" single collection, and they were recorded by an expanded KFM line-up, including members of Egghead, Lost Locker Combination, and the Marshmallows.

Side A:
Persephone PLease
Side B:
A Nudie Suit Made Of Bees

The 7" is limited to 300 copies, including 100 on green wax sold exclusivelly here and 100 on clear blue wax sold exclusivelly by Waterslide Record. Each copy includes an mp3 download code!

name: The BugZ "Demonio" LP
description:
After the split 7" with Golden Shower, THE BUGZ are back on SKR with their new album "Demonio", the 2nd of their career and the 1st that is released on vinyl. The fusion of different genres in a whole organic sound is one of the peculiarities of the band: many past influences like rock'n'roll, garage rock, blues, surf and rockabilly melt down with more recent styles such as punk, stoner and noise rock. Fans of Blues Explosion, Queens of The Stone Age, the Sonics, the Cramps and Elvis will not be disappointed!

SIDE A:

1 - Demonio
2 - Destroy Everything You Can
3 - Babe
4 - Animale
6 - Don't Hurt Me Now
6 -  Grrrrrrrrrr!

SIDE B:

1 - My Bad Love
2 - Rubia
3 - Bad Wave
4 - Reason To Stay
5 - Nothing
6 - Zilly BIlly

The record has been pressed on thick heavy black wax, and the 1st press is limited to 300 copies! Free download card included!!!

name: Hard-Ons/Manges & Joe King "Split Single!" 7"
description:
Australian punk rock heroes Hard-Ons and italian Ramones'  fanatics the Manges join their forces on this soon to be classic split 7", out on October 16th!

Tracklist:

Hard-Ons: "Aunty" - non album version
The Manges - "You don't wanna be like me" feauturing Joe King of the Queers on vocals!

The 7" is still available on 3 different kinds of coloured wax (very few of each kind left) and regular black wax (now at the special price of 3.99€ instead of 4.99!)

name: The Manges / Fast Food "Are Piigs!" split 7" - only a few available!
description:
Brand new Manges / Fast Food split 7"

Manges: 
1. Hit The Punchball (from the "Bad Juju" album) 
2. These Tears May Belong To Your Eyes (SenzaBenza cover)

Fast Food (Spain): 
3. Waikiki Beach (previously unreleased) 
4. Sueno De Verano (Shock Treatment cover)

name: Manges "Bad Juju - Sri Lanka" 7" - only a few copies available!!!
description:
Brand new Manges 7"!

Side a:
Bad Juju (From the album "Bad Juju") 

Side B:
Sri Lanka (previously unreleased Hard-ons cover)

name: Proton Packs "Weird Science" LP
description:
Hailing from the wild Tuscany (Italy), the Proton Packs are a 4-unit combo ready to blow your mind!
Their debut full-length “The Weird Science of Ecto-Punk” is a lethal mix of straight-forward and ass-kicking punk rock with sci-fi and nerdy themes and lyrics.
They call it Ecto-Punk. It will make your ghetto blaster explode.
With songs ranging from the truck driver’s anthem “Apocalypse Camion” to the pogo-inducing “Jesus Christ VS the Vampires”, the album is a full-scale frontal assault.
Beware of the Proton Packs.

Available on black wax (250 copies) or clear blue wax (50 copies)!
Rock ‘n’ Roll was here to stay.
Ecto-Punk is here today.


SIDE A 
1 - This Is Ecto 
2 - Double Dragon 
3 - Apocalypse Camion 
4 - Red Attack! 
5 - Psychohistory 
6 - Russian Cyborg 
7 - Season Of Evil

SIDE B

1 - We Believe 
2 - Weird Science 
3 - Jesus Christ VS The Vampires 
4 - Flying Spaghetti Monster 
5 - The Case Of John Openshaw 
6 - Second Foundation Mystery 
7 - Stay-Puft Marshmallow Man

name: Garbo's Daughter "Spin & Melt" 7"
description: SKR proudly itroduce you Orlando Florida's GARBO'S DAGHTER, the highschool prom band of your dreams!!! This is their very first 7" after their debut cassette on Burger Records from last year, feauturing three songs that will get your feet tappin' and your heart swoonin'! Avialable on black, punk or clear wax!!! Limited to 300 copies!!!

name: The Dahlmanns / Piperita Patties SPLIT 7" 2011
description:
The Dahlmanns from Norway (featuring the Yum Yums' guitar hero Ande D. and his wife Cecille D.) and the Piperita Patties from Italy (the one and only shop-punk band in the world) join their forces to give you the perfect sunny days' soundtrack! Four songs (2 for each band) about scrambled eggs, holidays, bikinis and teenage love! For fans of Nikki Corvette, the Ramones, Shonen Knife and Beatnik Termites!

Limied to 300 copies, coproduced with Waterslide Records from Japan! This is the european version of the record (150 piecies), the japanese one has an alternbative coverart by the grat italian artist Luca Tieri!

name: THE BUGS "eHarmony Rejected Me" 7"
description:
Brand new Bugs 7", containing 3 new and unreleased songs! This is Dangerous Dave's (The Queers/JCCC) "solo project", together with 2 other guys from The Rich White Males! For fans of Angry Samoans, the Ramones and GG Allin!

Available on black, green and red wax!!!

name: King Mastino - "Rock For Sailors" LP
description:
King Mastino - Las*Pezia, Italy, killer punk rock'n'roll heavily influenced by Stooges, MC5, Hellacopters and Turbonegro. 
Their first split 7" with Dead Swamp (also produced by SKR) has been reviewed as one of the greatest R'n'R records of 2010 by Rumore (one of the  most improtant alternaive music magazines in Italy). 
"Rock for Sailors" is their 1st LP and contains 11 songs. 
First run is limited to only 300 copies! Artwork by Manuel "Manges" Cossu.

name: M.O.T.O. - No Way Street 7"
description:
SKR001 
OUR VERY FIRST RELEASE! 500 HANDNUMBERED COPIES AVAILABLE IN BLACK (300), PURPLE (150) OR TRANSPARENT BLUE (50) VINYL! 


(ONLY BLACK WAX COPIES LEFT!)

name: Golden Shower/The BugZ split 7"
description:
Killer split 7" feauturing 2 new kick ass bands from Italy: Golden Shower play wild rock & roll inspired by Fuzztones, Sonics, Cramps and Rocket From The Crypt, the Bugz play dirty blues punk influenced by the Cramps, Pussy Galore, Blues Explosion and Bob Log III. 

1st run limited to 300 copies, 250 on black wax and 50 on red!

http://www.myspace.com/thebugzband
http://www.myspace.com/mrgoldenshower

name: The Shieldsss - S/T ONESIDED LP
description: Straight from Sicily, the Shieldsss, punk rock next big thing feauturing members of Semprefreski, Popsters, F.U.G., Veterans and other great bands that made the italian three-chord sound famous all around the world. This is their debut album, produced and mixed by the legendary Stephen Egerton of Descendents and All. First run is limited to 300 onesided copies with screenprinted B side!

name: The Shieldsss tshirt
description:
Fruit of the Loom classic valueweight, screenprinted with the same stancil used for the LP b-side. 
Available in man S-M-L and girl S-M. Limited run!

name: Dead Swamp / King Mastino - Split 7"
description:
Two new kick ass italian bands on one single piece of wax! Fans of Hellacoptars, Dictators, MC5, Turbonegro and Stooges won't be desappointed! 

Tracklist: 
King Mastino: Mama's rollin - Bad Moon 
Dead Swamp: The Game / Hurricane

K.M. cover by Manuel Manges, D.S. cover by Riccardo Bucchioni. Limited to 300 handnumbered copies, 100 on black wax, 100 on sea blue wax and 100 on clear zombie green wax!

name: Piperita Patties - Too cool for school 7"
description:
Debut single for the 1st and only shop-punk band in the world! Three bubblegum tunes that will be stuck in your brain forever!
Every single comes with 2 inflatable baloons feauturing the PP's lollipop logo!

name: Dangerous Chickens - Space Affair 7"
description: New pice of wax for this r'n'r duo composed of Honey Slim on guitar/screams and Billy Stioner at the drums (aka Max and Manuel from old/new Manges' lineups)! A rough mix between Ramones, Stooges, Sonics, Hives, Motorhead and cop siren noises, limited to 300 copies (50 on clear wax, a very few left)!

name: Dangerous Chickens "Good Cop" 10"
description:
Dangerous Chickens' 2nd release published by the great Italian label Badmar Rercords! Undercovered current and ex Manges' members involved: Honey Slim- guitar and yelling, Billy Stoner- drums and 1234s. Old scool garage punk with Ramones-Cramps-Stooges recals = A FUCKING MUST HAVE!!! 
Free huge poster inside!!!

name: Paul Collins' Beat / Radio Days - Yellow Submarine split 7"
description:
SKR007
Living rock'n'roll legend Paul Collins (!!!) and his band the Beat meet the best italian Beatles wannabes Radio Days on this double A-sided 7"!

Tracklist: 
Paul Collins' Beat - This is America
Radio Days: I belong to you

name: Donald Thompson - S/T 7"
description:
First record for this killer band from Italy, rough mix of Hellacoptars, Dean Dirg and kicks in the head!

Limited to 300 handumbered copies!

name: Fracula - "Bucket" onesided LP
description:
DEVO'S GRANDSONS ARE BACK!
 
12 SONGS, NO COVERART, SILKSCREENED B-SIDE IN 3 DIFFERENT COLOURS. A MUST-HAVE!!!
ONLY 200 COPIES, 150 WHIT REGULAR GRAPHICs (90 YELLOW, 60 PINK), 50 WITH GREEN ALTERNATIVE ONE

Read more: http://www.myspace.com/surfinkirecords#ixzz0uLkZGCdK

name: Fracula - "Music for Derelicts" 7"
description:
2 monsters, 1/2 brain! Geek music for geek people, heavily influenced by Devo, Sigue Sigue Sputnik and cheap beer!

Limiterd to 300 copies, 250 on black wax, 50 on red & white (less than 10 left). Every copy includes the most incredible poster you've ever seen!
